channel.title: Uncategorized on Ghostdogs
channel.description: Recent content in Uncategorized on Ghostdogs

item.title: No miracle cures
item.description: This is a subject I was going to stay away from but I have had loads of emails, mostly from America on the subject of autism ‘cures’ and how to make Tam well again. I have to say I was surprised and was not expecting the number of emails but the content has been sickening. I would have much preferred spam about anything else. Of all the emails the majority talk about these Miracle Supplement available on the internet.
